AssignProject.title: Specifying the Associated Project of a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance

CreateBackupDBInstance.document: This example shows how to back up an instance.
CreateBackupDBInstance.title: Backing Up an Instance

CreateDBInstance.document: This example applies only to version 4.0. For other versions, see the version description for the input parameters.
CreateDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-0akbol5v",
    "GoodsNum": 1,
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2",
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "Period": 1,
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": 250,
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_40_WT",
    "NodeNum": 3,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "Memory": 4,
    "SubnetId": "subnet-fyrtjbqw",
    "Password": "pwd123456"
}
CreateDBInstance.title: Creating a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance in Monthly Subscription Mode

CreateDBInstanceHour.document: This example applies only to version 4.0. For other versions, see the version description for the input parameters.
CreateDBInstanceHour.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstanceHour
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3",
    "GoodsNum": 1,
    "Clone": 1,
    "Memory": 4,
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": 250,
    "NodeNum": 2,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_50_WT"
}
CreateDBInstanceHour.title: Creating a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance (Pay-as-You-Go)

DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.document: This example shows you how to view the list of all databases of the current instance when the input parameter DbName is left blank.
DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDBInstanceNamespace
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-qny2****"
}
DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.title: Querying the Database List of the Current Instance

DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.document: This example shows you how to query the information on all collections of the database when DbName is specified.
DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDBInstanceNamespace
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-qny2****",
    "DbName": "demo_db0"
}
DescribeDBInstanceNamespace.title: Querying All Collections of the Specified Database

        1

}

DescribeInstanceParams.document: This example shows you how to call this API to obtain the list of configurable parameters for a TencentDB for MongoDB instance.
DescribeInstanceParams.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeInstanceParams
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-9d0p****"
}

{
    "Response": {

                "ParamName": "setParameter.failIndexKeyTooLong",
                "Status": 0,

                    "",

        "InstanceIntegerParam": [

                "Unit": "",

            },
            {
                "CurrentValue": "600000",
                "DefaultValue": "600000",

                "Min": "1",
                "NeedRestart": "0",
                "ParamName": "setParameter.cursorTimeoutMillis",
                "Status": 0,

            {
                "CurrentValue": "33554432",

                "NeedRestart": "0",

DescribeSecurityGroup.document: This example shows you how to query all security groups bound to the current instance.
DescribeSecurityGroup.title: Querying an Instance Security Group

DescribeSlowLogPatterns.title: Querying Database Slow Log Statistics Information

DescribeSlowLogs.document: This example shows you how to obtain the slow log information on an instance.
DescribeSlowLogs.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeSlowLogs
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-r3p8****",
    "StartTime": "2025-09-22 00:00:00",
    "EndTime": "2025-09-23 00:00:00",
    "SlowMS": 100,
    "Offset": 1,
    "Limit": 1,
    "Format": "json"
}
DescribeSlowLogs.title: Obtaining the Slow Log Information on an Instance

}

InquirePriceCreateDBInstances.title: Querying the Price for Purchasing Database Instances

InquirePriceModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This example shows you how to query the price of a specified instance after adjustment.
InquirePriceModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: Querying the price of a specified instance after adjustment

InquirePriceRenewDBInstances.title: Querying the renewal price of an instance

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.document: This example shows you how to modify the VIP information on a TencentDB for MongoDB instance.
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-9d0p****",
    "OldIpExpiredTime": 1,
    "NetworkAddresses": [
        {
            "NewIPAddress": "10.0.0.10",
            "OldIpAddress": "10.0.0.1"
        }
    ],
    "NewUniqVpcId": "vpc-gfb3****",
    "NewUniqSubnetId": "subnet-6fe2****"
}
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkAddress.title: Modifying the Network Information on a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance

ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroup.document: This example shows you how to modify the inbound rules of security groups for a specified instance.
ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroup
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-14i5****'",
    "SecurityGroupIds": [
        "sg-l7ip****"
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSecurityGroup.title: Modifying the Security Group Information on an Instance

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This example shows you how to adjust the configuration of a TencentDB for MongoDB instance.
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-p8vn****",
    "Volume": 250,
    "Memory": 4
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: Adjusting the Configuration of a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This example shows you how to delete 2 secondary nodes in total from Guangzhou Zone 2 and Zone 3. The final number of nodes changes to 3.
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-abcdef",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 3,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "RemoveNodeList": [
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node0",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "NodeName": "cmgo-3iecwbfx_0-node1",
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: Deleting Secondary Nodes from a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance

ModifyDBInstanceSpec.document: This example shows you how to add 2 secondary nodes in total to Guangzhou Zone 2 and Zone 3. The final number of nodes changes to 5.
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceSpec
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-p8vn****",
    "Memory": 4,
    "Volume": 100,
    "OplogSize": 30,
    "NodeNum": 5,
    "ReplicateSetNum": 1,
    "InMaintenance": 1,
    "AddNodeList": [
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"
        },
        {
            "Role": "SECONDARY",
            "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyDBInstanceSpec.title: Adding Secondary Nodes to a TencentDB for MongoDB Instance

ResetDBInstancePassword.document: This example shows you how to change the password of the user accessing the instance.
ResetDBInstancePassword.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ResetDBInstancePassword
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-7pje****",
    "UserName": "rwuser",
    "Password": "*******"
}
ResetDBInstancePassword.title: Changing the Password of the User Accessing the Instance

TerminateDBInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: TerminateDBInstances

{
    "InstanceId": "cmgo-7pje****"
}
TerminateDBInstances.title: Return and Refund for Monthly Subscription Instance
